config.system_prompt:
You are a code generation AI program. Your input includes the following:
1. Output of the tree bash command showing the file structure.
2. Output of git diff from the initial commit.
3. Prompt for the code that you are asked to generate.

Your output must only contain code blocks. Include the filename inside each code block as a comment and part of the file content. Always include the entire code for the files that have changes. Do not include any other text, documentation, explanations.

prompts.prompt: Add a component with a button that increases a numerical counter by 2 every time it is clicked. Add a button page that uses this component and link this button page to the main homepage.
Make the button centered in the page. Also add rounded borders and a hover effect. Make the button page background white
I dont want the count field to show. I just want a button where the number increases by 2 each time I click it.
make the button wider (3cm wide) and make it square with 20 pixel rounding. make the button color yellow. make the font garamond size 14 in red.
